Question: When printing the most representative words from each topic what best describes the insight we gain?
Answer: The top words in each topic correspond to the most frequently used words in the corpus
The topics are defined by their representative words and the document is a mixture of these topics
Documents have topics and the words describe the corpus
The words make up the document and the topics describe the words
Topics are latent features and the top words describe the average document
Correct: Topics are latent features and the top words describe the average document
